Data: Stoinis to Rizwan, no run back of a length at off stump, pushed to midwicket
Stoinis to Rizwan, no run fuller, finds midwicket again
Stoinis to Rizwan, FOUR runs that's a bit of a long hop, dragged down short, Rizwan pulls powerfully through square leg
Stoinis to Rizwan, no run full at the stumps, squeezed into midwicket

Stoinis to Rizwan, FOUR runs short again, outside off, hammered through midwicket and Richardson is in some trouble in the deep. He's signalled to the dressing room straightaway. Pulled out a massive dive, landed heavily on his bowling arm - the elbow digging into the turf
Stoinis to Rizwan, 1 run back of a length outside off, played to deep cover
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run skips down the pitch and clips to long-on
Lyon to Haris Sohail, FOUR runs fraction short outside off, very nicely played through point with a square drive
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 1 run driven to deep cover
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run short outside off, onto the back foot and pushed to long-on
Lyon to Haris Sohail, no run driven square to point
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 1 run flicked from off stump into midwicket
Zampa to Haris Sohail, no run over the wicket, full at straight, driven to mid-off
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run flicks a full delivery to long-on
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run goes down very early to sweep this, a straight delivery which wasn't that full, sends it to deep square
Zampa to Haris Sohail, no run full at the stumps, driven back to the bowler who gets a hand on it
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run shorter delivery, slides on, he's on the back foot and drives to deep cover
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run full outside off, driven to deep cover
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run short of a length outside off, pushed to deep cover
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 1 run round the wicket, works a straight delivery to deep midwicket
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run worked off the stumps behind square on the leg side
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 1 run uses his feet, doesn't quite to the pitch but eases it along the ground through the covers
Lyon to Rizwan, no run good length outside off, tapped into the off side and it's racing off again for the run. Sent back.
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run short outside off, leans back towards leg and places it to deep cover
Zampa to Rizwan, no run comes down the pitch but it's a back-of-a-length delivery and he ends up padding it away
Zampa to Rizwan, no run defended to the off side
Zampa to Rizwan, FOUR runs plays a strong sweep, takes it from around off stump and sends it through square leg
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run touch too short outside off, driven from the back foot to deep cover
Zampa to Haris Sohail, no run left alone outside off
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run full at leg stump, clipped off the toes to deep square leg
Finch to Haris Sohail, no run round the wicket, full at the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
Finch to Haris Sohail, 1 run worked off the stumps through midwicket
Finch to Rizwan, no run short outside off, isn't costly as he drives to cover
Finch to Rizwan, no run length outside off, left alone
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run short outside off, clubbed down to long-on...tried to hit that too hard
Finch to Haris Sohail, no run full at off stump, tapped carefully back to Finch who sneaks through the over for just two runs. That's a real bonus
Zampa to Rizwan, no run legbreak, and it sits up outside off to be pushed firmly to point
Zampa to Rizwan, no run floated up much fuller this time, and Rizwan digs it out back to him
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run Rizwan backs away, exposing his stumps, and chops a straight one off the stumps and out through cover point
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run a wristy flick threads the gap wide of midwicket, and that's the fifty stand
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run eased down to long off, one more
Zampa to Haris Sohail, no run generous flight on this googly to end the over, Haris reading it and stepping forward to defend
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run pushed through the off side field for a single
Finch to Haris Sohail, no run tucked into the leg side, and he can't find space

Finch to Haris Sohail, OUT got him! Australia are missing Richardson, but Finch has broken through for them with a golden left arm. He flights one up outside off, Haris pushing lazily inside the line at it as the ball rushes on with the arm and a thin edge being safely pouched by Carey. A third ODI wicket for Finch!
Finch to Umar Akmal, 1 run he's off the mark straight away, pushing down the ground
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run placed through mid off to turn the strike back over
Finch to Umar Akmal, no run quicker one from Finch, a little darter that beats a flick and pings the pad - well outside leg
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run Rizwan hops back to punch a legbreak out to the sweeper
Zampa to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs thrashed square! Zampa tempted the shot with a very full, very wide googly and Umar launches into a scything drive through point
Zampa to Umar Akmal, no run nice and full, but straighter and it's pushed back to the bowler
Zampa to Umar Akmal, no run Umar leans forward watchfully, presenting the full face in defence
Zampa to Umar Akmal, no run nice line from Zampa, and a little quicker on off stump, but it's easily kept out
Zampa to Umar Akmal, 1 run googly, and it's a good one, but Umar reads it and taps a single through cover
Finch to Umar Akmal, no run floated up by Finch, Umar looks for a tip-and-run single to cover but the fielder's too sharp
Finch to Umar Akmal, no run nicely bowled, outside off, and Lyon puts in a dive at cover point to stop Umar's push
Finch to Umar Akmal, no run chopped into the covers, once again Lyon stops it
Finch to Umar Akmal, 1 run Umar stays deep and wrists a straight one into the leg side this time, a single to mid on
Finch to Rizwan, FOUR runs Finch loops one too far down the leg side and he's punished by Rizwan, who bends low into a well-placed sweep and raises the hundred in the process
Finch to Rizwan, no run Rizwan steps back to punch a quicker one back at Finch
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run sharp turn into him, but it's much too short and Umar sets himself for a big pull. But he doesn't get all of it, and it's just a single to midwicket
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run punched down the ground to long on, playing with the spin
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 2 runs lovely little late cut from Umar, who waits and waits and then dabs it fine, but the boundary is saved by a diving Shaun Marsh and they're kept to two
Lyon to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs no stopping this one! Too short, too wide, and Umar spanks a cut through point
Lyon to Umar Akmal, no run straighter this time, and it's pushed back to the bowler
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run another pull, but it's inside edged into the leg side so just the one
Finch to Umar Akmal, 1 run flighted up on middle and leg by Finch, and it's dug out to long on
Finch to Rizwan, no run flatter, on off stump, and it's tapped back at him
Finch to Rizwan, no run Rizwan sweeps one handed, the ball dribbles to leg and Umar wants a single, but he's sent back
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run pushed out through cover for a single
Finch to Umar Akmal, no run nicely straight from Finch, and Umar can't do anything with it
Finch to Umar Akmal, no run a hint of width outside off, but Umar's chop goes straight to cover
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run glanced with the spin past short fine
Lyon to Umar Akmal, no run Umar slices a good-looking cut, but it's smartly stopped at point

Lyon to Umar Akmal, OUT Umar holes out! He kept trying to attack the midwicket boundary in Lyon's last over, and that tactic has brought his downfall now. Umar hops back and pulls the ball high towards midwicket, but the connection's not good enough to get it past Handscomb in the deep
Lyon to Malik, no run pressed watchfully back to the bowler
Lyon to Malik, no run Shoaib looks for a late cut, but finds short third man
Lyon to Malik, 1 run a touch of spin for Lyon, but the batsman works with it to find a single into the leg side
Finch to Malik, no run generous flight from Finch, Malik has a good look and taps it back to him
Finch to Malik, 1 run Malik hangs back, nudging a run through mid on
Finch to Rizwan, no run floated up nice and high on off stump, Rizwan leaning forward to defend
Finch to Rizwan, no run looped down at 75km/h by Finch, and Rizwan rather over-eggs his sweep, inside edging onto his pad
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run punched through mid off for one
Finch to Malik, no run quicker one from Finch, and it's punched to point
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run nurdled close in on the leg side, but Malik's call comes straight away and they pinch a quick single before Carey can get to it
Lyon to Malik, 2 runs Lyon stays around the stumps, Malik dabbing a late cut fine of short third
Lyon to Malik, SIX runs walloped over wide long off! Malik hops out into an inside-out drive, staying inside the line and holding his shape. Nicely played, first six of the innings
Lyon to Malik, 1 run quicker, and Malik turns the strike over with a single into the leg side
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 bye was this edged? The umpire signals byes. Rizwan backed away at one that went on with the arm but missed it, and so did the keeper
Lyon to Malik, 1 run speared down at 92km/h, and he finds a single through square leg
Finch to Malik, no run flighted outside off at just more than 79km/h, Malik defending to point
Finch to Malik, no run Malik looks to place a drive through cover, but can't beat the field
Finch to Malik, no run a floater on off stump is tapped back to him
Finch to Malik, 1 run a backfoot punch brings a single to long on
Finch to Rizwan, no run Rizwan flicks firmly back at Finch, who stumbles into Malik as he tries to stop it. No hard feelings
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run a drive out to the cover sweeper keeps Rizwan on strike
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run skidding into the pads, and Rizwan glances behind square
Zampa to Malik, 1 run nicely bowled, a legbreak full on an off stump line, but Malik meets it with a neat drive to long off
Zampa to Rizwan, no run slider, into the stumps and Rizwan hurries a jab to keep it out
Zampa to Rizwan, no run full, on middle and leg, and it's dug out back to the bowler. That's the 90th dot ball of the innings
Zampa to Rizwan, FOUR runs and that's the 16th boundary! Rizwan bends low into a powerful sweep, placing it well
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run a front foot pull sends the ball bouncing out to deep midwicket, and takes Rizwan to fifty - his 4th in ODIs
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run Rizwan nails another sweep, but it goes along the ground and straight to the man at deep backward square
Finch to Malik, 1 run punched through mid on for one
Finch to Rizwan, no run huge flight from Finch, and Rizwan can only dig it out back to him
Finch to Rizwan, no run Rizwan hops back at a very tame long-hop outside off, but he chops straight to cover
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run a sliced cut isn't stopped cleanly at point by Lyon, and they take a single
Finch to Malik, 1 run flicked off the toes for one
Zampa to Malik, 3 runs misfield in the deep after Malik backs away at a nippy wrong 'un and punches out through cover. Coulter-Nile almost over-runs it, but recovers to save the boundary
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run pushed down to long off for a single
Zampa to Malik, no run nicely bowled, spinning away outside off, and a soft drive is easily intercepted at cover
Zampa to Malik, 1 run another googly, but it's read and pushed to long on
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run flighted up outside off, and Rizwan meets it with a fluid drive that bounces out to the sweeper
Zampa to Malik, FOUR runs lovely placement from Malik, who hangs back on bended knee and places a backfoot punch to the right of point to pick up his first four
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run Rizwan steps into drive down to long off
Finch to Malik, 1 run Finch nudges 77km/h and Malik gets back and across, working across his pads for a single
Finch to Rizwan, no run chopped straight to cover
Finch to Rizwan, no run a touch quicker at 79.7km/h, but again Rizwan pings the cover field
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run fuller this time, and he drives out to the sweeper
Finch to Malik, 1 run pressed through mid on, one more
Coulter-Nile to Malik, 2 runs Malik flicks the returning Coulter-Nile off his pads, and hard running brings two
Coulter-Nile to Malik, no run on a length and nicely straight at 132km/h, Malik defending from the crease
Coulter-Nile to Malik, 1 run punched firmly off the back foot, in front of square and out to the sweeper
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, 1 run rising outside off stump, Rizwan hopping to chop it through gully
Coulter-Nile to Malik, no run Malik aims for a straight drive, but can't time the stroke
Coulter-Nile to Malik, no run Malik walks across to off but Coulter-Nile follows him and a flick is stopped at midwicket
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run massive flight from Finch, the ball eventually getting through at just 75km/h, and it's driven to long off
Finch to Malik, 1 run placed through cover, just the one
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run Rizwan stays deep and finds a gap at extra cover
Finch to Malik, no run a committed dive from Maxwell at cover stops Malik's punch
Finch to Malik, 1 run this time he finds the gap, and it's a single out to the sweeper, raising the fifty stand
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run Rizwan lunges forward to get to the pitch, threading the gap at cover
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, no run full and straight, pushed back at him
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, FOUR runs laced through point! Rizwan is up on his tippy toes, getting on top of a rising ball and thrashing a cut through the gap
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, 1 run a wristy flick fetches an off stump delivery into the leg side, turning the strike over
Coulter-Nile to Malik, no run fuller this time, and Malik can't get his drive past the bowler
Coulter-Nile to Malik, 1 run offcutter, outside off, and he waits on it before dabbing to third man
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, 1 run a punchy drive goes to mid on, but he's deep and they take him on for a single
Finch to Rizwan, FOUR runs is it one too many? Rizwan bends low and slogs a sweep wide of midwicket

Finch to Rizwan, FOUR runs and now he's swept! Finch had only conceded a single boundary before these two deliveries. Rizwan gets very low once again, and this time he rolls his wrists and places a sweep fine
Finch to Rizwan, 2 runs a touch too short, and Rizwan pulls meatily off the front foot to go to his highest score in ODIs
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run worked off the pads for a quick single
Finch to Malik, 1 run speared in flatter by Finch, and Malik nurdles to leg
Finch to Rizwan, no run generous flight to end the over, and Finch's spell, and he dives to stop a drive back to him to end it with a dot - but it's still 12 off the over
Zampa to Malik, 1 run too straight, Malik glancing off his pads for a single
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run Rizwan skips out and goes inside-out over cover, but the shot is stopped in the deep
Zampa to Malik, 1 run googly, Malik hanging back and placing it through point
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run Rizwan dabs a late cut to short third man, and there's just enough time for a single. Couldn't quite get it fine enough
Zampa to Malik, 1 run Malik comes forward, driving out to the sweeper
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run swept fine, but the fielder's around in a flash and it's just a single
Maxwell to Rizwan, 2 runs Maxwell comes around the stumps, and Rizwan greets him with a Maxwell-esque shot, bending right down onto his knee and dabbing an unorthordox late cut fine
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run punched out to long off for one
Maxwell to Malik, 1 run worked into the leg side, with the spin
Maxwell to Rizwan, no run Maxwell gets across quickly to his right to cut off a drive down the ground
Maxwell to Rizwan, no run whipped to leg, but he can't beat midwicket
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run and now he's forward to drive, Lyon diving over one at cover to allow a single
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run flighted outside off, and he's on the drive down to long off
Zampa to Malik, 1 run Malik is on the front foot to place a drive through cover, and this stand is into the 80s
Zampa to Rizwan, no run googly from Zampa, and italmost sneaks through as Rizwan hangs back and looks for a cut
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run a drive finds the cover sweeper for a single
Zampa to Malik, 1 run eased down to long off, one more
Zampa to Rizwan, no run a front foot dab goes straight to point
Maxwell to Malik, no run round the wicket, gets a leading edge which pops back down the pitch as he aims to leg
Maxwell to Malik, FOUR runs short and wide outside off, well placed backward of point for a boundary to bring up 200
Maxwell to Malik, 1 run back on the stumps, flicked down to long-on
Maxwell to Rizwan, no run short outside off, steps back but cracks his drive to cover
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run another leading edge, looking to turn a full delivery at off stump to the leg side and it runs to long-off
Maxwell to Malik, no run flicked back to the bowler. Maxwell hustles through another
Stoinis to Rizwan, no run full outside off, punched firmly back at the bowler
Stoinis to Rizwan, 1 run full, at the stumps, flicked backward of square to long leg
Stoinis to Malik, 1 run low full toss outside off, bunted down the ground to long-on
Stoinis to Rizwan, no run that's a wild shot, charges down the pitch and has a big heave to the leg side, the ball scoots between bat and pad
Stoinis to Rizwan, 1 run full and straight, pushed down to long-on
Stoinis to Malik, no run full at off stump, Stoinis gets across in his followthrough to cut it off
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run over the wicket, flicked from off stump down the ground
Lyon to Malik, no run flicks a straight delivery to the man at midwicket
Lyon to Malik, 1 run on the pads, tucks it wide enough of midwicket for the single
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run full outside off, draws him forward and he dabs into backward point
Lyon to Malik, 1 run flatter, shorter, worked off the pads to deep square but just another single
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run a shorter delivery, sticks in the pitch a little, worked down to long-on. Binary batting
Stoinis to Rizwan, 1 wide slips down the leg side
Stoinis to Rizwan, 1 run length ball outside off, pushed to long-on
Stoinis to Malik, no run a bouncer, he ducks underneath...could probably have taken that on
Stoinis to Malik, 1 run another short ball, on leg stump, this time he pulls down to long leg
Stoinis to Rizwan, 2 runs back of a length, straight, tucked through midwicket and a good piece of running to break the singles
Stoinis to Rizwan, no run drives through a length delivery outside off but clunks it to cover
Stoinis to Rizwan, no run beaten! Back of a length, just outside off, scoots through past off stump...perhaps kept a touch low, Rizwan was on the back foot
Lyon to Malik, 1 run tucks a length delivery behind square on the leg side
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run gets across the stumps and nudges to the leg side
Lyon to Malik, 1 run straight delivery, tucked to deep square leg and that's fifty for the captain
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run milking singles on the leg side, but Australia will be happy with this
Lyon to Malik, 2 runs steps back outside leg and places this square through the off side, wide of the sweeper
Lyon to Malik, no run gets away with a short ball, dragged down on leg stump, Malik pulls but picks out short fine leg
Zampa to Rizwan, no run over the wicket, full and straight, pushed back to the bowler
Zampa to Rizwan, 2 runs outside off, short of a length, cuts square through the off side and that takes him to 99
Zampa to Rizwan, no run short of a length, fired in at leg stump, can't whip this away
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run there it is! A maiden ODI hundred for Rizwan as he sweeps this off the stumps to deep square. The promotion has worked a treat.
Zampa to Malik, FOUR runs dropped at long-on by Maxwell! Malik used his feet, clubbed this straight of long-on, so Maxwell had to make some ground, it was a low chance and he couldn't hold on
Zampa to Malik, 1 run now the shots are coming, aims this down the ground again and gets an inside edge to the leg side
Lyon to Malik, 1 run full and straight, flicked to midwicket and it's left through for a single. Maxwell again!
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run this turns quite a lot from outside off, dabbed into the covers
Lyon to Malik, 1 run pushes a straight delivery through straight midwicket, long-on prevents the second
Lyon to Rizwan, no run an appeal for lbw as he goes for the sweep, no one is that interested
Lyon to Rizwan, 2 runs moves outside leg stump very early, gave Lyon an early look at all three, then an inside edge skews down to fine leg with a wild throw allowing an extra run
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run swept to deep backward square
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run comes down the pitch, it's a quicker delivery, flat-batted to deep cover
Zampa to Malik, 1 run plays forward and drives into the covers
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run comes down the pitch and drives powerfully just out of the reach of Zampa to his left

Zampa to Malik, OUT finds long-on and Maxwell is safe this time! Has a smile about it. Malik came down the pitch, the ball was full outside leg stump, couldn't get the leverage he needed and it went straight to Maxwell
Zampa to Faheem, no run full at straight, defended
Zampa to Faheem, no run tossed up on off stump, driven into the covers. Tidy finish for Zampa
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run turns from outside off into the stumps, pushed to the covers. Rizwan pulls out the dive
Lyon to Faheem, 1 run round the wicket, paddle sweeps from outside off to deep square leg
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 leg bye appeal for lbw as he misses a sweep, Dharmasena says not out
Lyon to Faheem, no run full at off stump, pushed to cover
Lyon to Faheem, FOUR runs just over slip! He brings out the reverse sweep, goes much finer than he wanted, slip leaps in the air but can't quite get there
Lyon to Faheem, no run well bowled, that's a lovely delivery, squares up Faheem and takes a thick outside edge to short third man...slip had been brought out, that may have been a catch
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, FOUR runs moving all over the crease then scoops this over the keeper, his first boundary for 43 balls and it's a cheeky one
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, FOUR runs that's hit powerfully! Comes down the pitch and swings across the line at a back-of-a-length delivery, beats deep midwicket who didn't pick it up straightaway
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, no run moves outside leg stump to give himself room, it's full at the stumps, driven to mid-off

Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, OUT brilliantly done by Maxwell on the boundary if he's stayed inside the rope...A full delivery lofted down the ground towards long-on, Maxwell back-tracking towards the boundary, gets underneath it, knows his momentum is going to take him over the rope, throws the ball back inside but has his heel touched the boundary? This
Coulter-Nile to Faheem, 1 leg bye full outside leg stump, deflects off the pad to midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, no run tries to come down the pitch, gets taken on the pad and it bobbles back to NCN
Stoinis to Faheem, no run starts moving outside leg, Stoinis sees him, drops it in short outside off, Faheem flashes and misses
Stoinis to Faheem, 1 run a slower ball, dug in, pulled in the air through square leg
Stoinis to Imad Wasim, no run full outside off, another cutter, swings and misses, goes on the second bounce to Carey
Stoinis to Imad Wasim, 1 run a wide yorker, he drives and gets a bottom edge into his boot which bobbles to the off side
Stoinis to Faheem, no run another slower short ball, he's been hit on the helmet as he goes for the pull...the Australians immediately check on him. The stem guard has become loose
Stoinis to Faheem, 1 run full, wide outside off, he drives and it's another inside edge into the batsman which scuttles away
Coulter-Nile to Faheem, 1 run terrific yorker, squeezed out through midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, 1 run full and straight, clubbed back down the pitch but just a single as it comes off the toe of the bat
Coulter-Nile to Faheem, SIX runs back of a length, and launched into the stands! That's more like it from Faheem, uses his power to muscle this over long-on

Coulter-Nile to Faheem, OUT finds long-on! Coulter-Nile may have got away with this, was in the slot, Faheem was eyeing up another six over long-on but could get the distance. The bat twisted in his hand
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs a slower short ball and he plays this well, angles it between short third man and backward point
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, 1 run full outside off, cracked firmly to cover on the edge of the circle
Stoinis to Imad Wasim, 1 run swings across the line of a full delivery and gets a thick inside edge past the stumps to short fine leg

Stoinis to Yasir Shah, 1 run a slower ball into the pitch, gets a bottom edge as he pulls, lobs down by his feet and they scamper through...Stoinis kicks the ball into the stumps, they check for the run out but he's fine
Stoinis to Imad Wasim, SIX runs that's into the stands...a lovely pick-up off the pads by Imad, a cross-seamer from Stoinis which was on the wrong line
Stoinis to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs and now he finds the gap wide of mid-off! Gave himself a fraction of room, was a low full toss, driven through the in-field
Stoinis to Imad Wasim, 1 run another slower short ball, swatted to deep midwicket
Stoinis to Yasir Shah, no run a slower ball, short of a length, swings and misses and they don't try for the bye to the keeper

There's a feeling of deja vu from Pakistan. An innings based around a good century, this time from Mohammad Rizwan, but that falls short of 300. It's a decent total, but far from overwhelming. They will have to bowl and field well. Australia will certainly take it having lost Jhye Richardson after five of his overs to a shoulder injury. Aaron Finch bowling

7.05pm Pakistan walk onto the field and form a huddle ahead of the second dig. If you missed any of the action earlier, it's nicely summed up in Danyal Rasool's match report of a game that so far bears a striking resemblance to that played out between these teams on Friday.
7.09pm Imad Wasim will open the bowling
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run past the outside edge! Khawaja leans out at a full one that drifts away from him outside off, beating the bat
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run pushed across Khawaja from around the stumps, and this one is left alone
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run a smashing drive is stopped after a smart dive from Imam in the covers
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run punched firmly, but straight at mid off
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run beaten again! Classic Imad, drifting the ball away through the air with precious little flight, and Khawaja pokes inside it
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run full and straight, and he gets bat on this one, pushing it back to the bowler
Abbas to Finch, no run he hits a length in the channel and Finch is content defending from the crease
Abbas to Finch, no run floated fuller at 125km/h, and a Finch drive is intercepted at cover
Abbas to Finch, 1 run and Finch breaks a run of eight dots with a tip-and-run single to mid on, where Malik fields and throws down the stumps with the batsman comfortably home
Abbas to Khawaja, FOUR runs immediately, a boundary, with some sublime wristwork from Khawaja, who places the ball along the turf and past midwicket
Abbas to Khawaja, FOUR runs and now through the covers, Khawaja walking into a fluent little drive. The ball pings out of the middle and races through the gap
Abbas to Khawaja, no run Abbas straightens his line, aiming for the top of off, and Khawaja defends from the crease
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run still no runs off Imad, Finch stepping forward and defending it back to him
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run Imad snakes one in from outside off to hurry Finch's jabbing defence with a slider
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run Finch throws his hands into a drive, but the ball drifts in and takes the inside edge, rolling to short fine
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run nicely stopped by Haris Sohail at leg slip, the ball flicking the pad as it was speared down the leg side
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run Imad offers Finch no width whatsoever, firing one in at leg stump
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run finally a run off him, the ball coming off the inside half of Finch's bat and rolling into space at midwicket
Abbas to Finch, 1 run Finch drives on the up to mid off, and they take the fielder on with a quick single
Abbas to Khawaja, no run Khawaja confidently fetches a full one from outside off, but his shot is stopped at midwicket
Abbas to Khawaja, no run Khawaja hangs his hands out outside off and chops a length ball down close in, and there's no room for a quick single as Rizwan's quickly up
Abbas to Khawaja, no run Khawaja drives firmly, but straight to Malik
Abbas to Khawaja, no run Khawaja skips out, looking to get after Abbas, but punts it straight to mid on. Abbas walks down to have a few words
Abbas to Khawaja, 2 runs glanced down to fine leg for a brace, and that takes Khawaja to 1,000 runs in ODIs
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run and yet another dot to start, his 13th, as Finch pushes a full one back at the bowler
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run Finch drives towards mid off and wants a run, but it's too tight

Imad Wasim to Finch, 3 runs the first bad ball Imad has bowled, flung down the leg side and Finch just needs to get bat on it. And it's none other than Mohammad Hasnain who runs after it from short fine, hauling the ball in just inside the rope to save a run
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, FOUR runs but this one won't be stopped as Imad loses his line towards Khawaja's pads and is deftly glanced away
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, FOUR runs a handsome drive beats cover. It's a shot that wouldn't look out of place in the longer format, Khawaja leaning into a high-elbowed drive
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run flicked off the pads for a single
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja walks down as Abbas loops down a slower one at 113km/h, and he finds just enough space wide of mid on for a quick single

Abbas to Finch, 1 leg bye Abbas bends his back on this one and finds some seam movement into him off a good length, beating Finch's glance. The ball bounces off the pad and goes to gully, and they find a leg bye
Abbas to Khawaja, no run Khawaja whips smartly off his pads, but Imad bends low and stops it cleanly at short fine leg
Abbas to Khawaja, no run there's a nice crack off the bat as Khawaja steps into another flowing drive, but this time he finds cover
Abbas to Khawaja, FOUR runs wrong line from Abbas, zipping it down towards his pads, and Khawaja gets some willow on a fine glance
Abbas to Khawaja, no run much better from Abbas, aiming for the top of off, and Khawaja defends
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run Finch nurdles off his pads and doesn't beat short fine, but Khawaja calls him through for a quick single
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run Khawaja drives at one drifting across him, pinging mid off
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run Khawaja looks for a drop and run single, but point is in too quickly
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run speared in full at 96.7km/h, and it's tapped down to long on
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run a full length draws Finch forward, but he can only push softly to cover
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run Imad attacks the stumps, and it's dead-batted back at him
Faheem to Khawaja, no run and he hits a length outside off at 131km/h to start, Khawaja pushing to point
Faheem to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja waits on a late cut to find a single to third man
Faheem to Finch, no run Finch spots some width and punches outside off, but finds point
Faheem to Finch, no run Finch pushes at this one even more forcefully, but it's another dot as he can't get it through a packed off side field
Faheem to Finch, no run Faheem aims full at 134km/h, and it keeps a little low but Finch keeps it out
Faheem to Finch, no run Finch stands tall and looks to power one through cover, but yet again picks out the fielder
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run flicked off his toes and through midwicket

Imad Wasim to Finch, FOUR runs width, and it's punished! Imad had done such a good job of cramping Finch for room, but this is short and wide and Finch puts it away through point - importantly, he also placed it into the gap
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run this one is straighter, but he's worked through square leg to turn the strike over
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja lets his wrists do the work, and finds a single to long on
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run tapped softly towards midwicket, and they steal a quick single before the fielder can get to it

Imad Wasim to Khawaja, FOUR runs powered through cover, the two fielders in that region just looking at the ball and then at each other as the ball flies between them and away to the rope. No-one moved
Faheem to Finch, no run Faheem keeps it just short of a good length, Finch pressing to cover
Faheem to Finch, 1 leg bye there's a stifled appeal as the ball comes off the pad, but it's headed well down the leg side
Faheem to Khawaja, 1 run flicked softly into the leg side, where some sleepy fielding allows a run. Slight misfield from Haris Sohail

Faheem to Finch, no run just short of Imad! Finch has struggled to penetrate the cover region, so he tries to go over it, but mis-hits his drive. It flies in the air, but dips and drops short of Imad at mid off
Faheem to Finch, no run pushed into the off side, and again he can't beat the field
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, no run Hasnain charges in off a long run up and starts with a bristling bouncer at almost 143km/h, Khawaja's knees buckling under him as he ducks to get out of the way
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run rising off a length, just outside off, and Khawaja angles his bat to find a single near point
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run Hasnain steams in and hits a length at 146.2km/h, Finch forcing him away through point for a single
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run angled across Khawaja, who jabs late to find a single to third man
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run Hasnain finds some tail in through the air at close to 142km/h, and there's half an appeal as an inside edge bounces off Finch's pad into the leg side
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja thrusts his hands out at a delivery outside off at 147.4km/h, guiding a single to third man
Faheem to Khawaja, no run Khawaja drives back past the bowler, but mid on sprints around and dives to cut it off
Faheem to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja angles his bat and turns the strike over with a single to third man
Faheem to Finch, no run a hint of seam movement in to Finch, who pushes to mid on
Faheem to Finch, FOUR runs Finch doesn't bother moving his feet much, but lets his bottom hand lead the shot to power the ball up and over cover. Too full from Faheem, and there was some width
Faheem to Finch, no run the bowler pulls his length back in response to the last shot, Finch pushing to cover
Faheem to Finch, no run just short of a full length, outside off, and the ball comes off the inside half of the bat and rolls to midwicket
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja hops and whips off his hip to find a single through square leg

Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run testing bouncer! It seemed too quick for Finch at 146.9km/h, the ball skidding on to him and hitting him on the helmet before he was halfway into his pull. The ball hits him flush on the peak. He's fine, but he might need a new helmet out there. And there's a short delay as one is brought out to him
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run for the umpteenth time, Khawaja angles his bat and works it to third man
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, FOUR runs plenty of pace once again, but not enough direction as this one is fired down the leg side. Has Finch got bat on it? Looks like it's given as runs

Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run again Finch is late on the pull as a bouncer arrives at over 146km/h, splicing the shot tamely in the air but into space on the leg side. That's definitely hurried him
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, no run and he hits a full length on off stump to finish, Khawaja watchfully seeing him off
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run fizzing legbreak to start, and there's some spin straight away, the ball kissing the outside edge and rolling through gully
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run a little too short, and he's thumped out to the cover sweeper
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run Khawaja stays deep and works with the spin into the leg side
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run some drift for Yasir, but it's slightly too full and Khawaja flicks off his toes for a single
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run Finch goes back and across and works a straight one through mid on
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run tapped back past a diving bowler, another single
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run flicked off his pads and through midwicket for one
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, no run ouch! Finch is almost beaten again by a short-ish ball that rushes on to his pull, taking the inside edge and striking him in the midriff
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, no run skidding in to him at 142km/h, and Finch's glance is stopped at square leg
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run rising off a length at 141.6km/h, but there's a little width for Finch to work with and a he finds a single to the sweeper

Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, no run nippy bouncer at 141km/h, Khawaja ducking quickly under it. Hasnain wanders down after following through to eye-ball the batsman. It wasn't actually all that short, and not called a bouncer by the umpire
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, no run on a length and straight at 142.4km/h, Khawaja pushing to cover

Yasir Shah to Finch, SIX runs biffed over long on! There's a fielder in place down there, but Finch takes him on with a thump down the ground. He hits it hard, and not too high but far enough to beat a leaping fielder at the boundary's edge
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run ripping off a good, full length, Finch defending to cover
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run too short this time, and Finch hangs back to place a shot out to the sweeper
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja skips out to get close to a legbreak, working with the spin to find a single to short fine leg
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run slider on off stump. Finch backs away and exposes his stumps, but puts bat to ball to find another single through cover
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run beaten outside off by one that just zips straight across him
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, FOUR runs slugged wide of mid on, Finch seizing on one that's pitched up to him and muscling it into - and through - the leg side
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 bye dug in short, the ball loops over a ducking batsman but it's not stopped cleanly behind the stumps
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run worked off the pads down to fine leg

Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, FOUR runs pitched up outside off, and Hasnain finds a hint of shape in through the air, but Finch likes it in his half and he just swings through the line to send it straight back where it came from
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run Hasnain reverts to the bouncer at 143km/h, but Finch is expecting this one, waiting on the back foot to pull into the leg side
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, no run Khawaja shuffles and edges a pull onto his thigh, but there's no harm done
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run pushes a good-length delivery to cover
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run goes back to a shorter ball and plays down to long-off
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run gets across his stumps and tucks a straight delivery to deep square
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run this skids through a touch and Finch is on the back foot, but he's able to drive out to deep cover
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run flicked off the stumps straight of midwicket
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run fuller, clubbed down to long-on
Haris Sohail to Finch, no run round the wicket, on a length at off stump, pushed to cover
Haris Sohail to Finch, FOUR runs uses his feet and crunches this straight down the ground, handsome way for Finch to reach his fifty. Also the century stand
Haris Sohail to Finch, 1 run driven along the ground to long-off
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, no run round the wicket, misses his flick to the leg side and it takes the pad
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, 1 run pushed square into the off side
Haris Sohail to Finch, no run uses his feet again, takes this from outside off to midwicket
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run driven off the back foot to cover
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run full outside leg, swept behind square, was in the air for a little while
Yasir Shah to Finch, FOUR runs dragged down short outside off, driven off the back foot and placed excellently wide of long-off
Yasir Shah to Finch, SIX runs that's huge, onto the roof...Finch opens his shoulders, launches it straight down the ground. Didn't use his feet, stayed in the crease, just swung through the line
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run full, gets forward and defends

Yasir Shah to Finch, SIX runs and now he goes over the leg side, that's an even better shot, an effortless pick-up off his pads which has sailed into the stands at deep midwicket. What a difference a few weeks makes
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, no run round the wicket, pushed across and beats the outside edge as Khawaja is a little lazy with his push
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, 1 run bottom hand takes over this time and he drags it down to long-on
Haris Sohail to Finch, no run angled into the pads, he can't get it away
Haris Sohail to Finch, no run full at middle and leg, plays forward and it runs off an inside edge to midwicket
Haris Sohail to Finch, no run pushes a full delivery back to the bowler
Haris Sohail to Finch, 1 run short outside off, cracked down to long-off
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 wide round the wicket, fired down the leg side
Imad Wasim to Finch, FOUR runs that's a heave, but an effective heave, runs to the midwicket rope despite coming off not much more than a think inside edge as he went for a big drive
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run dabbed from outside off to short third man
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run opens the face and places in front of point
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run round the wicket, whipped off the pads to deep square and that's another fifty for Khawaja
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run full at the stumps, defended
Imad Wasim to Finch, SIX runs that's miles back over long on...again he stayed in the crease, just freed his arms and lofted a full delivery into the second tier
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, 1 run round the wicket, flicked through midwicket
Haris Sohail to Finch, 1 run tapped off the pads into midwicket
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, 1 run strides forward, driven to deep cover
Haris Sohail to Finch, 1 run goes back in the crease and flicks this off the stumps to deep square leg
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, 1 run flicked from outside off square into the leg side
Haris Sohail to Finch, no run this one gripped a little, straighten on Finch and squared him up as he aimed to the leg side
Faheem to Khawaja, 1 run angled across outside off, opens the face and runs it to third man
Faheem to Finch, 1 run worked off the stumps to long leg
Faheem to Khawaja, 2 runs short outside off, driven from the back foot to deep cover
Faheem to Khawaja, 1 run just over the bowler's head as Khawaja gets a leading edge looking to work this through midwicket, turned the bat face early
Faheem to Finch, 1 run short of a length outside, punched to deep cover
Faheem to Khawaja, 1 run driven square to deep point off the back foot
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, no run full at off stump, driven firmly to cover
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, no run a flatter delivery, outside off, defended
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, FOUR runs dragged down short, Khawaja rocks back and pulls it sweetly through square leg...excellent placement
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, no run fuller, pushed back to the bowler
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, 1 run gets across to off stump and plays a bottom-handed whip to long-on
Haris Sohail to Finch, no run plays forward and nudges to midwicket

Faheem to Khawaja, 2 runs round the wicket, short of a length, Khawaja gets inside the line and flicks it fine of long leg...Yasir Shah races around, dives and tries to flick it back. And, actually, the third umpire rules he just kept it in
Faheem to Khawaja, no run gets beaten as this bounces a touch more from back of a length, climbs over the top edge as he aims to drive
Faheem to Khawaja, no run back of a length outside off, played into backward point
Faheem to Khawaja, 2 runs moves across the crease again, whips it from outside off through square leg, lovely timing, and Shan Masood does very well in the deep to prevent the boundary
Faheem to Khawaja, no run back of a length outside off, defended to point
Faheem to Khawaja, no run driven off the back foot to cover
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, no run full at off stump, 143kph, defended to the off side
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, no run back of a length at middle and off, 143kph, pushed towards mid-off...jarring the splice
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, no run fuller, at the stumps, hint of shape in at the batsman, played to the covers. Impressive stuff
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, no run through him with a short one again as Finch is caught in a tangle as he thinks about pulling, ends up awkwardly getting out of the line
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run full outside off, 144kph, driven just to the left of mid-off for a sharp single
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, no run a bouncer over leg stump, Khawaja lets it over his back. Excellent comeback over
Faheem to Finch, 1 run short outside off, slides off the face down to third man as he drives from the back foot
Faheem to Khawaja, 2 runs round the wicket, short of a length, pulled off one leg just in front of square, but good work by Masood on the boundary to flick it back
Faheem to Khawaja, 1 run flicks a length delivery from outside off to deep midwicket
Faheem to Finch, 1 run short outside off, pulled well in front of square as that sat up nicely
Faheem to Khawaja, no run round the wicket, full outside off, driven to mid-on with a closed bat face
Faheem to Khawaja, no run gets forward into a length ball and punches to cover
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, no run good length at off stump, pushed to the covers
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, no run back of a length outside off, touch of shape away, played to point off the back foot
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, FOUR runs rolls his wrists over a short ball and places this superbly behind square...into the 90s
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run played out into the deep on the off side
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run full outside off, whipped wide of mid-on, they look for the second but decline
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 2 runs short outside off, dabbed down to third man, Imad dives to keep it in
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run round the wicket, full outside off, Khawaja walks at the bowler then flicks to deep square leg
Abbas to Finch, no run full at the stumps, pushed towards mid-on
Abbas to Finch, 2 runs terrific placement, worked off the stumps behind square, Faheem slides around the boundary and does well to cut it off
Abbas to Finch, no run pushes a length delivery to mid-off
Abbas to Finch, 1 run sweetly struck off the back foot to the cover sweeper
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run full, angled in at off stump, tickled to the leg side off the inside half of the bat
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 wide round the wicket, short, pushed well down the leg side
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run full outside off, angled past backward point to third man
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, no run good length on off stump, 130kph, defended to backward point
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run short of a length, pulled/swatted to deep square
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run good length outside off, pushed easily into the gap at cover
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 2 runs back-to-back hundreds for the captain as he clips a full delivery off his toes through midwicket. Lets our a roar, helmet comes off. He's certainly back to his best
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, no run a short delivery, 144kph, defended on the back foot
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run over the wicket, back of a length, chopped to third man
Abbas to Finch, no run length ball outside off, driven to cover
Abbas to Finch, 1 run shapes into the pads, deflects backward of square
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run more whippage from Khawaja as he takes this from outside off stump to deep square
Abbas to Finch, 1 run back of a length, just outside off, driven from the back foot to mid-off
Abbas to Khawaja, no run fuller, at the stumps, clipped to midwicket
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run full outside leg, goes for the sweep and it comes off the pad
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run brings out the reverse sweep, finds short third man
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run tries it again, another reverse, think this one comes off the bottom edge
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run back to something conventional, works a straight delivery to deep midwicket
Yasir Shah to Finch, 4 runs plays back and drives to cover...then there's a wild throw which gives away four runs! Umar Akmal the culprit with an awful return past Rizwan
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run off the back foot past the bowler to long-off
Abbas to Finch, 1 run clips a straight delivery wide of a diving midwicket
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run round the wicket, full and straight, clipped to deep midwicket
Abbas to Finch, 1 leg bye back of a length, into the pads, rebounds towards square leg
Abbas to Khawaja, no run a short ball from round wicket, Khawaja was walking down the pitch and let to go over his back
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 wide full, speared down the leg side, bowl that again
Abbas to Khawaja, FOUR runs short outside off, he does really well to get over the top of this and pull it backward of square...brings up the 200 stand
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run back of a length outside off, runs it down to third man to keep the strike
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run flicked to square leg
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run finds the gap into the deep this time off the pads
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run full at the stumps, defended
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run tossed up, plenty of air, a stinging straight drive just wide of Yasir who was probably pleased he couldn't get a hand on it
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run reverse sweeps and picks out short third man
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run uses his feet and works out to deep midwicket
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 leg bye Khawaja misses a whip into the leg side, but they find a leg bye
Abbas to Finch, 1 run
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja walks into a drive, pushing it on the up past point
Abbas to Finch, no run Finch drives, but finds mid off
Abbas to Finch, 1 run full, and seaming in to Finch, who works it fine on the leg side
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run this one keeps a little low, but Khawaja spots it and flicks into the leg side
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run beaten on the outside edge by a back-of-the-hand variation
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run floated up, Khawaja can't get it away
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run Yasir attacks the stumps but Maxwell is forward to keep it out
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run full and straight, and it's poked defensively to extra cover
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run drifting in to Finch, who punches down the ground
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, 1 run speared in full, from around the stumps, Maxwell placing a drive out to deep extra
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run drifting in mischievously, but Finch reads it and finds a quick single to cover
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, no run this one's held back a touch, Maxwell's drive being aimed at the cover fielder
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, 1 run full and wide, tempting Maxwell into a flashy square drive that brings only a single to the sweeper
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run this keeps very low as it comes in with the arm, but Finch's bat is down in time and he keeps the strike with a single to long off
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run whipped off the pads, but straight to short fine leg
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run sliding on towards the stumps, but Finch is back and across to work it into the leg side
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, 1 run Maxwell sweeps, but doesn't get much on it and there's only a single to be had to short fine
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run chopped off the stumps and back to the bowler
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run speared down at middle and off, Finch pushing it back to the bowler
Yasir Shah to Finch, FOUR runs Finch ruins a tight over, his eyes lighting up at a flighted delivery just outside off. A powerful drive bursts straight back over Yasir and away for four
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, no run an in-drifter squirts off the inside edge, rolling to short fine leg
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, no run punched off the back foot, but straight to cover
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, 1 wide speared down the leg side to add to the extras column
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, SIX runs slammed high over long on! Maxwell's had a look, now he has a go. He backs away to leg and then heaves mightily over the leg side for a maximum
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, 1 run another bottom-handed thump from Maxwell, and it goes on the bounce out to Imad at long on
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run drifting down the leg side, and it comes off the pad and rolls fine
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, SIX runs HUGE! Maxwell ends the over with a massive swipe down the ground. He gets an excellent connection, and sends the ball onto the roof of the grandstand
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run sliding on straight, and Finch picks it to find a single behind square on the leg side
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, 2 runs pushed through flat on off stump by Yasir, Maxwell flicking into the leg side and rushing back for a second to take the required runs under 50
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run not much turn, but a bit of extra bounce for Yasir and Maxwell is taken a little by surprise
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, 1 run a touch too short, and he's slapped out to the cover sweeper
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run pushed defensively to cover
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run worked off the toes, and they push the fielder for a quick single
Faheem to Finch, 1 run a length ball comes off the inside half of a poke outside off, rolling into space on the leg side

Faheem to Maxwell, OUT direct hit, and Maxwell walks off straight away, even as the umpire sends it upstairs. He pushed to mid off and set off for what would have been a tight single, had the throw not been deadly accurate to find him short. He just hit it and set off, but Haris Sohail's throw was sharp and on target. Replays simply confirm his demi
Faheem to Finch, 1 run pushed through the gap at extra cover for one
Faheem to Marsh, no run Marsh works off his pads, but finds the field
Faheem to Marsh, no run Faheem stays tight on off stump, and Marsh can't get off the mark just yet
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run but now he is, angling his bat to find a single to third man
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 2 byes beaten in the flight, but Rizwan can't stop it cleanly either and they pinch a bye. Two, in fact
Yasir Shah to Marsh, no run turned with the spin into the leg side
Yasir Shah to Marsh, no run Yasir goes wide on the crease from around the stumps, Marsh defending into the leg side with the spin
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 2 runs floated up outside off, Marsh threads a drive through cover and they're back for the second
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run punched down to long on for one
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run Finch drives down the ground, and he'll keep the strike
Faheem to Finch, no run punched into the cover field, but he can't break through
Faheem to Finch, 1 run worked into the gap on the leg side for a single
Faheem to Marsh, no run Marsh is a little squared up by one that goes across him, but keeps it out well enough
Faheem to Marsh, no run Marsh pulls, though it's not that short, and his shot is stopped at midwicket
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run chopped down close in, in front of point, and they hurry through for a quick single
Faheem to Finch, no run tight end to the over from Faheem, who once again finds some seam movement in to cramp Finch for room
Mohammad Hasnain to Marsh, no run beaten outside off by one that holds its line, good start
Mohammad Hasnain to Marsh, 2 runs full and wide at 142km/h and Marsh flays it uppishly through point. Shan Masood dives in the deep to save runs
Mohammad Hasnain to Marsh, 1 leg bye pushed down towards his legs, and they find a single off the pad
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, no run beaten on the back foot outside off stump. Finch just swished inside it, and he's upset with himself
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run Hasnain targets the stumps at almost 139km/h, Finch finding a single with a bottom-handed push into the leg side

Mohammad Hasnain to Marsh, no run direct hit would have had him! Marsh taps to point and sets off. Finch sends him back, but he's slow to turn, and had the throw been accurate, he would have been out. Tough chance, just the one stump to aim at for Imam
Faheem to Finch, no run seaming in off a length, and Finch can't get it past midwicket

Faheem to Finch, 1 run chipped uppishly into the leg side, and again midwicket cuts it off but they take him on for a quick single. The throw goes wide. And was possibly to the wrong end, as Marsh had hesitated setting off from the other end. A better throw could have made things interesting
Faheem to Marsh, no run Marsh pulls, but it doesn't come onto the bat and he can't beat the infield

Faheem to Marsh, 1 run in the air, but safe! Marsh looks to pull in the air, but it rushes on to him and loops off the splice ... but falls safely at mid on! If long on had been up, that would have been the simplest of catches

Faheem to Finch, 2 runs just short of Yasir in the deep! Finch goes on the attack now, lifting a length ball over the leg side. He doesn't connect well, but that actually saves him as Yasir can't get in off the midwicket boundary in time to catch it - though he stops the boundary
Faheem to Finch, 1 run pushed down to long on, just the one
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run well bowled! Hasnain slings down a quick yorker at the toes, Finch hurrying to keep it out. That just tailed in through the air as well ...
Mohammad Hasnain to Marsh, 1 run short, and it's pulled just wide of mid on. Haris Sohail is in position there, and he has a shy but misses. There have been a few nervy runs in the last few minutes
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, SIX runs this will help! Finch picks up the length early, getting under the ball to swat it in the air and over the leg side boundary
Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run another reverse swinging yorker at 144.6km/h, but it's dug out down the ground for a single
Mohammad Hasnain to Marsh, 1 run Marsh is forward and slaps a fluid drive out to the sweeper after Hasnain aims full

Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run pitched right up at a shade over 145km/h, and Finch drives straight to cover. They take on Haris Sohail in the position for a single, and Finch wasn't even in the frame as the throw came in ... but again it goes wide!
Faheem to Finch, SIX runs spanked straight back down the ground, and Finch equals his highest score in ODI cricket
Faheem to Finch, FOUR runs 150 up for Aaron Finch! He gets there from 141 deliveries, flicking the ball sweetly through square leg. Back to back tons, and a career best
Faheem to Finch, 1 run pushed through mid on, just the one
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run tip-and-run single, Marsh dead-batting it close on the off side and Finch calling him through
Faheem to Finch, 2 leg byes Finch misses his flick, but the ball pings off his pad and rolls to fine leg. They're back for the second, and that's the game!

That's all from your commentary team tonight. We hope you've enjoyed our coverage. Do join us for the third game in Abu Dhabi on Wednesday. And don't forget to check out Danyal Rasool's match report on your way out. Until next time, goodbye!
Aaron Finch is the Player of the Match

10.43pm A fifth ODI win in a row for Australia, and Aaron Finch leads from the front once again with a career-best 153 not out as his team equal the record for the highest successful run chase at this ground. The result is eerily similar to that in the first ODI - again, Pakistan were a good 20 to 30 runs short, and Australia cruise home to win by eight wi
Australia won by 8 wickets (with 13 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Aaron Finch, AUS
